title: What is history of Char Bhinti in Satara? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hello, That’s the great Question…!!! well Char Bhinti is a important historical place in Satara Constructed by Chatrapati Pratapsinh Maharaj in 1830. This place called as Najar Bangala. From this place you can see whole Satara City and other side of Ajinkyatara fort. Char Bhinti, which means ‘Four Walls’ in the local dialect, can be found midway to Ajinkyatara Fort. The place is dedicated to the freedom fighters who took part in the uprising of 1857 and other patriotic struggles against the British Raj. Names of famous freedom fighters like Rani Laxmibai of Jhansi and Lokmanya Tilak can be found inscribed on the memorial. This place is having a Shrine to remember of great freedom fighter of 1857. This place was renovated at 2001. Place remembers Rani Lakshmibai,Rango Bapuji Gupte, Tatya Tope and others.  Thank You :)
